description: SQL statements for SQLite 3 (sqlite_master and pragma_*)

GetSchemasStatement.sql: SELECT 'main' AS SCHEMANAME, '' AS owner, NULL AS create_time, '' AS remarks

GetTablesForSchema.sql: SELECT name AS tabname, '' AS owner, NULL AS create_time, 0 AS row_count, '' AS remarks FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetTablesForSchemaSimple.sql: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetAllTablesSimple.sql: SELECT 'main.' || name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetViewsForSchema.sql: SELECT name AS viewname, '' AS definer, '' AS remarks, NULL AS alter_time FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' ORDER BY name

GetViewsForSchemaSimple.sql: SELECT name AS viewname FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' ORDER BY name

GetAllViewsSimple.sql: SELECT 'main.' || name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' ORDER BY name

GetFunctionsForSchema.description: SQLite has no stored functions; empty.

GetSequencesForSchema.sql: SELECT name AS seqname, '' AS owner, '' AS remarks FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND sql LIKE '%AUTOINCREMENT%' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' AND ( ? = 'main' OR ? = '' ) ORDER BY name

GetTriggersForSchema.sql: SELECT name AS trigname, tbl_name AS tabname, '' AS trigtime, '' AS trigevent FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' AND ( ? = 'main' OR ? = '' ) ORDER BY name

GetIndexesForSchema.sql: SELECT name AS indname, tbl_name AS tabname, CASE WHEN sql LIKE '%UNIQUE%' THEN 'U' ELSE 'D' END AS uniquerule, 'btree' AS indextype, COALESCE(sql, '') AS colnames FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'index' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetTableColumnsForTable.sql: SELECT name AS colname, cid + 1 AS colno, type AS typename, 0 AS length, 0 AS scale, CASE WHEN notnull THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS nullable, COALESCE(dflt_value, '-') AS default_value, '' AS remarks FROM pragma_table_info(?) ORDER BY cid

GetPrimaryKeysForTable.sql: SELECT name AS colname, pk AS colseq FROM pragma_table_info(?) WHERE pk > 0 ORDER BY pk

GetForeignKeysForTable.sql: SELECT '' AS fk_name, '' AS ref_schema, '' AS ref_table, '' AS fk_columns, '' AS pk_columns, '' AS delete_rule, '' AS update_rule WHERE 0
GetForeignKeysForTable.description: Get foreign keys (pragma_foreign_key_list in app if needed).

GetIndexesForTable.sql: SELECT name AS indname, CASE WHEN sql LIKE '%UNIQUE%' THEN 'U' ELSE 'D' END AS uniquerule, 'btree' AS indextype, COALESCE(sql, '') AS colnames, NULL AS create_time FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'index' AND tbl_name = ? AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetViewDefinition.sql: SELECT sql AS view_definition FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' AND name = ?

GetViewText.sql: SELECT sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' AND name = ? LIMIT 1
GetViewText.description: Get view definition by view name only.

GetTriggerDefinition.sql: SELECT sql AS trigger_definition FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' AND name = ?

GetUserAccessLevel.sql: SELECT 'sqlite' AS username, 'Y' AS dbadmauth, 'Y' AS secadmauth

SERVICE_GetTableColumnsBasic.sql: SELECT name AS ColumnName, cid + 1 AS COLNO, type AS DataType, 0 AS LENGTH, 0 AS SCALE, CASE WHEN notnull THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS Nullable, COALESCE(dflt_value, '-') AS DefaultValue, '' AS Remarks FROM pragma_table_info(?) ORDER BY cid
SERVICE_GetTableColumnsBasic.description: Get columns for a table by table name. Used by connection manager.

GetSchemasStatement_ListSchemas.description: List schemas for Missing FK / dialogs.

GetTablesForSchema_ListTables.sql: SELECT name AS tabname FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name
GetTablesForSchema_ListTables.description: List tables in schema for Missing FK / dialogs.

ListTables.sql: SELECT 'main' AS tabschema, name AS tabname, 'T' AS type, 0 AS card, NULL AS npages, NULL AS fpages, NULL AS status, '' AS remarks FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' AND ( ? = 'main' OR 1=1 ) ORDER BY name
ListTables.description: List tables with metadata. Schema filter supports %.

ListViews.sql: SELECT 'main' AS viewschema, name AS viewname, 'Y' AS valid, 'N' AS readonly FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' ORDER BY name

ListProcedures.sql: SELECT '' AS routineschema, '' AS routinename, '' AS language, 0 AS parametercount WHERE 0

ListTriggers.sql: SELECT 'main' AS trigschema, name AS trigname, 'main' AS tabschema, tbl_name AS tabname, '' AS trigtime, '' AS trigevent, 'Y' AS enabled FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' ORDER BY name

ListFunctions.sql: SELECT '' AS routineschema, '' AS routinename, '' AS language, 0 AS parametercount WHERE 0

GetTableColumns_Display.sql: SELECT name AS columnname, type AS datatype, CASE WHEN notnull THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS nullable FROM pragma_table_info(?) ORDER BY cid

GetPrimaryKeyColumns.sql: SELECT 'main' AS tabschema, ? AS tabname, 'PK' AS constname, name AS colname, pk AS colseq FROM pragma_table_info(?) WHERE pk > 0 ORDER BY pk

GetTableForeignKeys_Detailed.sql: SELECT '' AS fkname, '' AS fkcolumn, '' AS pktable, '' AS pkcolumn, '' AS deleterule, '' AS updaterule WHERE 0

GetTableIndexes_Aggregated.sql: SELECT name AS indexname, 'btree' AS indextype, CASE WHEN sql LIKE '%UNIQUE%' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS isunique, '' AS columns FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'index' AND tbl_name = ? AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name

GetTableStatistics.sql: SELECT 0 AS rowcount, 0 AS numberofpages, 0 AS formattedpages, 0 AS overflowpages, NULL AS laststatstime, '' AS compression, '' AS tableorganization, 0 AS avgrowsize
GetTableStatistics.description: Get table statistics (SQLite: rowcount not available without dynamic SQL; return 0).

GetTriggerInfo.sql: SELECT name AS trigname, 'main' AS trigschema, 'main' AS tabschema, tbl_name AS tabname, '' AS trigtime, '' AS trigevent, 'Y' AS enabled, 'Y' AS valid, '' AS remarks, COALESCE(sql, '') AS text, NULL AS create_time FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' AND name = ?

GetTriggerUsage.sql: SELECT 'main' AS trigschema, name AS trigname, 'main' AS tabschema, tbl_name AS tabname, '' AS trigtime, '' AS trigevent, 'Y' AS enabled, 'Y' AS valid FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' ORDER BY name

GetViewInfo.sql: SELECT name AS viewname, 'main' AS viewschema, '' AS definer, 'Y' AS valid, 'N' AS readonly, '' AS remarks, NULL AS create_time FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'view' AND name = ?

GetProcedureInfo.sql: SELECT '' AS routinename, '' AS routineschema, '' AS definer, '' AS language, 'N' AS deterministic, 'U' AS origin, NULL AS create_time WHERE 0
GetProcedureInfo.description: Get procedure details (CLI) - empty for SQLite.

GetFunctionInfo.sql: SELECT '' AS routinename, '' AS routineschema, '' AS definer, '' AS language, 'N' AS deterministic, 'U' AS origin, NULL AS create_time WHERE 0
GetFunctionInfo.description: Get function details (CLI) - empty for SQLite.

GetViewColumns_Display.sql: SELECT name AS columnname, type AS datatype, CASE WHEN notnull THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS nullable FROM pragma_table_info(?) ORDER BY cid

GetViewDependencies.description: Get view dependencies (SQLite: parse view SQL or empty).

GetRoutineSource.description: Get routine source - empty for SQLite.

GetRoutineParameters_Display.sql: SELECT '' AS parmname, '' AS typename, '' AS parm_mode, NULL AS length WHERE 0
GetRoutineParameters_Display.description: Get routine parameters - empty for SQLite.

GetRoutineProperties.sql: SELECT '' AS language, 0 AS parm_count, '' AS owner, NULL AS create_time, 'Y' AS valid, '' AS remarks WHERE 0
GetRoutineProperties.description: Get routine properties - empty for SQLite.

GetTriggerSource.sql: SELECT sql AS text FROM sqlite_master WHERE type = 'trigger' AND name = ?

GetIncomingForeignKeys.sql: SELECT '' AS REFERENCING_SCHEMA, '' AS REFERENCING_TABLE, '' AS CONSTNAME, '' AS FK_COLNAMES, '' AS PK_COLNAMES, '' AS DELETERULE, '' AS UPDATERULE WHERE 0
